try 'sudo  mii-tool eth0 -F 100baseTx-FD'  & then try dhcpclient again
you may also need to check the same settings on the router

at the bottom of the eth0 section in /etc/network/interfaces, add a line 'pre-up mii-tool eth0 -F 100baseTx-FD'
